data.text:
When you join LMA, you are surrounded by like-minded people in an environment where hard work brings great reward. You are taught by industry professionals in state of the art facilities

The LMA team give you the creative freedom you desire, to explore, to discover yourself and to give you the confidence to be the absolute best version of YOU.

LMA has amazing campuses in Liverpool and London and is co-owned by global superstar ROBBIE WILLIAMS.
